AT.name: Monkey Pirates
AT.description: Du steuerst bei Monkey Pirates das Boot eines der vier Monkey Kapitäne und kämpfst in verschiedenen Spielmodi und in verschiedenen Arenen, basierend auf vier Seeumgebungen (Arktis, Karibik, Ägypten und China). </br> In diesen Arenen wirst du verschiedene Boni finden. Mit diesen kannst du entweder deine Waffen verbessern, dein Schiff aufbessern oder mit einigen speziellen Boni Spezialeffekte einsetzen. Du musst ebenfalls mit besonderen Elementen umgehen, etwa Eisberge, Vulkane, Teleports, Wirbel und schießende Türme. </br> Denkst du, du hast das Zeug für einen wahren Monkey Piraten?

BG.name: Monkey Pirates
BG.description: In Monkey Pirates you control the boat of one of the four Monkey Captains and you fight regarding different game modes over multiples arenas based on four seas environments (Arctic, Caribbean, Egypt and China). </br> In those arenas you'll find multiples bonuses in order to either, improve your weaponry, improve your ship, or some special bonuses for a special effect. You will also have to deal special elements such as icebergs, volcanoes, teleports, maelstroms and shooting turrets. </br> Do you think you have what it takes to become a true Monkey Pirate?

BE.name: Monkey Pirates
BE.description: Dans Monkey Pirates vous pilotez le bateau de l'un des quatre capitaines singes. Vous affronterez alors les autres joueurs sur différents modes de jeu dans des arènes situées dans quatre mers (Arctique, Caraïbe, Egypte et Chine). </br> Dans ces arènes vous trouverez de multiples bonus qui vous permettront soit d’accroître votre armement, soit d’améliorer votre bateau, ou encore de lancer un effet spécial. Vous devrez aussi faire attention aux éléments extérieurs tels que les icebergs, volcans, tourbillons et autres tourelles. </br> Pensez-vous avoir ce qu’il faut pour devenir un vrai capitaine pirate ?

IT.name: Monkey Pirates
IT.description: In Monkey Pirates governi la barca di uno dei quattro capitani scimmie. Affronterai così gli altri giocatori su modalità di gioco differenti in arene situate in quattro mari (Artico, dei Caraibi, dell’Egitto e della Cina). </br> In queste arene troverai diversi bonus che ti permetteranno sia di accrescere il tuo armamento sia di migliorare la tua imbarcazione, o anche di lanciare un effetto speciale. Dovrai anche fare attenzione agli elementi esterni, come iceberg, vulcani, vortici e altre torrette. </br> Pensi di avere tutto ciò che serve per diventare un vero capitano pirata?

FR.name: Monkey Pirates
FR.description: Dans Monkey Pirates vous pilotez le bateau de l'un des quatre capitaines singes. Vous affronterez alors les autres joueurs sur différents modes de jeu dans des arènes situées dans quatre mers (Arctique, Caraïbe, Egypte et Chine). </br> Dans ces arènes vous trouverez de multiples bonus qui vous permettront soit d’accroître votre armement, soit d’améliorer votre bateau, ou encore de lancer un effet spécial. Vous devrez aussi faire attention aux éléments extérieurs tels que les icebergs, volcans, tourbillons et autres tourelles. </br> Pensez-vous avoir ce qu’il faut pour devenir un vrai capitaine pirate ?

EE.name: Monkey Pirates

You will also have to deal special elements such as icebergs, volcanoes, teleports, maelstroms and shooting turrets. </br> Do you think you have what it takes to become a true Monkey Pirate?

ES.name: Monkey Pirates
ES.description: En Monkey Pirates sube el barco de uno de los cuatro capitanes monos. Enfrentará entonces a otros jugadores en diferentes modos de juego en los ámbitos a través de cuatro mares (Ártico, Caribe, Egipto y China). </br> En estos espacios se pueden encontrar muchos bonos que les permitiría, ya sea aumentar su armamento o para mejorar su barco o lanzar un efecto especial. Usted también tendrá que prestar atención a los factores externos, como los icebergs, volcanes, remolinos y otras torretas. </br> ¿Piensa tener lo que se necesita para convertirse en un auténtico capitán pirata?

HR.name: Monkey Pirates
HR.description: In Monkey Pirates you control the boat of one of the four Monkey Captains and you fight regarding different game modes over multiples arenas based on four seas environments (Arctic, Caribbean, Egypt and China). </br> In those arenas you'll find multiples bonuses in order to either, improve your weaponry, improve your ship, or some special bonuses for a special effect. You will also have to deal special elements such as icebergs, volcanoes, teleports, maelstroms and shooting turrets. </br> Do you think you have what it takes to become a true Monkey Pirate?

You will also have to deal special elements such as icebergs, volcanoes, teleports, maelstroms and shooting turrets. </br> Do you think you have what it takes to become a true Monkey Pirate?

NL.name: Monkey Pirates
NL.description: In Monkey Pirates bestuur je de boot van één van de vier Apenkapiteinen. Je strijdt tegen de andere spelers in verschillende spelmodi in arena’s die in vier verschillende zeeën liggen (Arctica, Caraïben, Egypte en China). </br> In deze arena’s tref je verschillende bonuspunten aan die je in staat stellen je wapentuig te verbeteren, je boot te verbeteren, of een speciaal effect te krijgen. Je moet ook letten op elementen van buitenaf zoals ijsbergen, vulkanen, draaikolken, en kanonschoten. </br> Denk je dat je alles in je hebt om een echte Apenkapitein te worden ?

MT.name: Monkey Pirates
MT.description: In Monkey Pirates you control the boat of one of the four Monkey Captains and you fight regarding different game modes over multiples arenas based on four seas environments (Arctic, Caribbean, Egypt and China). </br> In those arenas you'll find multiples bonuses in order to either, improve your weaponry, improve your ship, or some special bonuses for a special effect. RO.name: Monkey Pirates

You will also have to deal special elements such as icebergs, volcanoes, teleports, maelstroms and shooting turrets. </br> Do you think you have what it takes to become a true Monkey Pirate?

NO.name: Monkey Pirates
NO.description: In Monkey Pirates you control the boat of one of the four Monkey Captains and you fight regarding different game modes over multiples arenas based on four seas environments (Arctic, Caribbean, Egypt and China). </br> In those arenas you'll find multiples bonuses in order to either, improve your weaponry, improve your ship, or some special bonuses for a special effect. You will also have to deal special elements such as icebergs, volcanoes, teleports, maelstroms and shooting turrets. </br> Do you think you have what it takes to become a true Monkey Pirate?

PT.name: Monkey Pirates
PT.description: No Monkey Pirates, comande o barco de um dos quatro capitães macacos. Enfrentará então os outros jogados em diferentes modalidades de jogo em teatros de acção situados em quatro mares (Árctico, Caraíbas, Egipto e China). </br> Nestes teatros de acção, encontrará muitos bónus que lhe permitirão aumentar o seu armamento ou melhorar o seu barco ou, ainda, lançar um efeito especial. Também deverá ter atenção aos elementos externos como os icebergues, vulcões, redemoinhos e torres de tiro. </br> Pensa ter tudo o que é preciso para se tornar num verdadeiro capitão pirata?

RU.name: Monkey Pirates
RU.description: В игре Обезьяны-Пираты вы ведете корабль одного из капитанов-обезьян. Вы столкнетесь с другими игроками на разных режимах игры на театре боевых действий в четырех морях (Северном Ледовитом, Карибском, Египетском и Китайском). </br> На этих театрах вас ждут многочисленные бонусы, позволяющие вам усилить свое вооружение или улучшить свой корабль, либо же запустить спецэффект. Будьте также внимательны к внешним стихиям типа айсбергов, вулканов, смерчей и прочих сторожевых башен. </br> Вы уверены, что у вас есть все, чтобы стать настоящим капитаном пиратов?

LT.description: In Monkey Pirates you control the boat of one of the four Monkey Captains and you fight regarding different game modes over multiples arenas based on four seas environments (Arctic, Caribbean, Egypt and China). </br> In those arenas you'll find multiples bonuses in order to either, improve your weaponry, improve your ship, or some special bonuses for a special effect.
